WRITING.TEXT: I agree the game is broken in some manners and you have a right to be angry but don #8217;t let this get to you man just know there is a lot of us dealing with it too. Hopefully they get their shit together, maybe fixing the system when the new card class in July rolls in. Try to stay mellow bro, smoke a blunt maybe lol, this isn #8217;t worth all the negativity for your own sake. Stay happy~

Funny glitch but on a serious note just out of curiosity if you don #8217;t mind me asking, how long have you been playing this game for and have you spent any $ to make it all the way up there? Just curious if there #8217;s anyone competing with the whales that is F2P.
I had high hopes for the pvp fix. My first 3 matches I was ranked against a lv 21, 19, and 22. I #8217;m lv 15...

I #8217;m lv 15 and have been between 4200-4600 since the pvp switch 2 months ago. If you #8217;ve been experiencing what I have been then Sadly we #8217;re stuck with all of the lv 18-22 nks that are staying in silver, and the other lv 13-15 nks with lv 5 epics and lv 3 legendaries. It seems it #8217;s probably going to be this way for awhile.

WRITING.TITLE: Chicken Coop
WRITING.TEXT: Just seeing if this is a struggle for others. Was anyone else 2-3 shields away from getting that guaranteed chicken coop card before they updated the pvp system 2 months back? And now stuck right below the rank but being constantly matched with players with level 3 chicken coop? I understand chicken coop is easy to counter but it #8217;s pretty annoying to have been so close to getting the card and now it #8217;s out of reach. I #8217;ve seen lv 13s with the card..i don #8217;t even run fantasy often but it #8217;d just be nice to have the option to use it.
+1 lol. Dougie is the only reason mind control is a permanent card in my hand, you can tell a lot of them don #8217;t anticipate it when they play him.

It #8217;s always nice to mind control someones cyborg Kenny, unless they #8217;re running purify they almost always lose a bar or have to use arrowstorm/another 4+cost card to dispose of their own card.

I #8217;m gonna agree with the rest of them..what the fuck. If you want a realistic answer I #8217;d say that would never happen for the sole fact that Stan literally pukes on Wendy everytime they #8217;ve ever attempted to kiss. I could imagine what trying to fuck her would do to him.

Didn #8217;t even consider that actually. In theory yeah you #8217;d have a chance at them once the cards are added into rotation. I just have a feeling red lynx is going to seize the opportunity to sell the legendaries first in paid packs and make it nearly impossible to obtain them in regular packs until a little while after releasing.

WRITING.TITLE: These kind of matches are the reason why I continue to play. Sadly no one gets any loot but I #8217;ve had more fun in a competitive match with no winner than when one overpowers the other in 60 seconds. Good Game Sir.
Calling all Dougie and Double Dougie Users
WRITING.TEXT: Just for one moment, I #8217;d like to see past the hate and the judgement that Dougie users receive. Do not misunderstand me I dislike Dougie just as much as the next guy, and seeing 2 Dougies is even more irritating. There are many players that spend endless cash to beat the competition, there are people who still derank themselves to the bottom of their rank limit. 8/10 of the matches I lose are due to being overpowered by my opponents rank. not dougie users. There are many ways to counter a dougie it #8217;s not like he #8217;s that hard to face. So Dougie users, this is your chance to explain yourselves. why do you use dougie? Do you even have any fun using him? A lot of the Dougie users I #8217;m up against (especially ones with 2) normally have no functionality between their other cards, kind of just blindly play them. Is it for a quick easy win? Do you use him as a strategy move? If so what is your usual strategy with him. Do you just play him when he #8217;s in your hand? Do you save him until all hope is lost and it #8217;s a last attempt or when matched with a overpowered player? I #8217;d especially like to hear from double Dougie users. I like honesty, I have no gain in causing you any shame. No hate guys, I #8217;m just genuinely curious. He #8217;s in the game and there #8217;s nothing stopping it. So I #8217;d like to just get a mindset of what #8217;s going on whenever I #8217;m facing up against Dougie users. Thank you~
Can #8217;t argue with that statement

I think it #8217;s just to make a fair trade for their immunity to certain spells/charges. If it #8217;s the only unit immune to certain things it should also be penalized in some way to keep it fair.

I do see your point, I think my only personal point on the subject is that a Dougie gives you 2-3 seconds to plan out a defense. besides mind controlling him, he #8217;s just an annoying waste of time to deal with. Cyborg Kenny I #8217;d say is a bit more easily dealt with, rats take him out easily, purify can instantly nullify his deathwish. Even just placing towelie near your nk and killing him with your zap. Works bout 85% of the time for me. Best yet, use your lower level cyborg Kenny against an opponents cyborg Kenny. Plus the whole mind controlling thing is sorta part of the Sci-Fi theme. In simpler words, Dougie is Ass. -Thankyou

I guess it #8217;s down to what you consider the game worth. A legendary is not worth 2000 cartman cash (roughly $20 real money) in my opinion. Especially if your alternative is getting the battlepass which could guarantee you 3 legendaries and the possibility of more. Yeah SOMM at lv 2 for that arena is strong, but you #8217;ll just be moving 300 up the bracket and getting stuck against higher lv people again. If $5 is worth that small rank increase to you, go for it. I find the pvp matching too broken to invest real money on it.
That #8217;s the one thing I wish they added was a small picture of my deck layout on the main screen. Switched from story mode to pvp too many times without realizing before it was too late.

Please anyone that needs to hear this, you are better than this game. You don #8217;t need to buy this shit to be good, you are great how you are.

WRITING.TEXT: I #8217;m sorry for anyone who is annoyed by this but really guys, this is suppose to be a downtime to have some fun. If your bank account is suffering in the process than is it really any fun? This game is broken for a reason. If every match was fair people wouldn #8217;t find a reason to buy packs as often. If every match was friendly competition no one would need these packs. They #8217;re holding off fixing this shit because they know addicts will just keep buying until they can feel the joy of winning again. I #8217;m losing more and more respect for this company. I couldn #8217;t care less about how much I win or lose, but when I see a lv 13 with lv 3/4 legendaries and lv 5 epics, I #8217;m less mad and more concerned thinking of the person on the other side of the screen, who probably spends more money on this game than food. Everyone here is worth so much more than this. You guys deserve better. This is probably one of my most played games in the past year or so and watching this company abuse the people they can is disgusting. Have a nice day everyone!

Lmao guys why you salty. Can you not agree this game has some fucked up moments? The whole point is trying to make obvious that there are some clear problems with the game. It has a lot of potential and I #8217;m rather fond of it, I just rather express them than let these problems go unrecognized

After team wars end for the week and you collect your rewards you are able to leave your team and browse new ones. Make sure you do not vote for any cards during your search or you will be unable to compete for another team (besides whichever one you put votes in for). You can basically just keep joining and leaving teams until you find one that you like, as long as you make your decision before the voting period ends you can compete for the week.

I #8217;m sorry if you think people are trying to bully you into choosing specific cards. Some of these people have been playing for a long time and they know from experience which cards are best for most situations. You don #8217;t need to take the advice but the earlier recommendations I saw in your previous posts are pretty solid suggestions. Try out different combos and find one you like best buddy.

That #8217;s honestly trash my dude. Your right most of us have lives and are doing our best to stay as active as possible. Even if you scored only 20 points the fact you put in the time to help out should be appreciated, let alone getting 99 points. Sounds like trash leadership going on. I #8217;d invite you to join the team I #8217;m in but we barely are breaking silver right now, with your rank you should be in a higher team. Hope you find a group of respectable players to team up with. Some people are just plain dickheads.

I #8217;m not looking for an argument here, but the only point I #8217;m making is they have to draw a line somewhere. They make it easier for high ranked players to get tokens I assume as a reward for being long committed to the game. I #8217;m in silver and I got done a couple days ago, where as some people in wooden may not get the chance to complete it at all. Maybe they don #8217;t give a purpose for the extra tokens to avoid players with phone addictions feeling the need to play so much, likewise with the locker limits. I #8217;m not accusing you of being addicted I #8217;m just saying for a game that attempts to drain $ out of it #8217;s players with all their sellable packs the fact they even added a battle pass should be something we all appreciate, not nitpick at. Imagine having to play every single day or you wouldn #8217;t get every reward? Would that not be worse?

I #8217;m sure a #8220;top team #8221; out there would be willing to acknowledge your working schedule and accommodate you. We are always 50/50 with completing the weekend events and our team has managed 1st multiple weeks in a row and then other times we get 3rd or 4th. There is only 10-12 of us who communicate (and that is only in the team chat) and only 20-25 that play at all during the week, some people don #8217;t even use their battle tokens so it #8217;s rough sometimes. Like I said bro you deserve a silver team that is pushing through the leaderboard. Because much like a lot of the 1300-1700 crown teams, we have a lot of recruiting to do before we can progress further, too many teams of 40+ active players to battle against to get up there.

Yeah I feel you. Well our team is called Brosexuals. Our leader has been gone for awhile but our Co-leader is still around. We had 50 members but I removed 2 (they were under 800 elo and haven #8217;t played in two weeks) look us up and you can hang out for a week(or longer) if you can #8217;t find better, the people who do talk are all chill and friendly we can always use the help. You won #8217;t be kicked if you give any effort for the week, pretty sure we are purging a number of players on Monday to open up spots hoping for some active players.

And that #8217;s great bro, I #8217;m sure your team is a lot more successful than mine then. I play very frequently, I work 12 hour night shifts though and I imagine a lot of other players do have to work/tend to their everyday duties. Imagine if you end up in a situation where you can #8217;t play for a little bit for whatever reason, and they move the legendary pack to the final reward, and because you didn #8217;t play everyday you didn #8217;t get it. You #8217;d be more bummed with that loss than you would the extra tokens, no? I can see there are a number of people who do agree with you so I #8217;m not going to say one side is more valid than the other, I hope for your sake they do add a end of battle pass reward for extra battle tokens earned, I #8217;d gain from it too. Redlynx will do whatever Redlynx wants though. Have a nice day buddy!

Yeah I agree. I #8217;ve bought many $60 games and played them maybe 2-3 days. This game I #8217;ve been playing almost every day for 9-10 months. Hopefully they fix the issues with it because I would willingly put some money towards it if they do!

Like I said I #8217;d be fully willing to spend some money on this game once the recurring issues are fixed. Alright so I was just trying to consider how much time it would realistically take to get this score and I went farther than I thought. Feel free to correct any of my math here. So let #8217;s say the User used the Maximum 9 cards able to be used at once for the card event. A score of 4149 would then require 461 matches. Now let #8217;s say this person isn #8217;t a cheater/deranker, let #8217;s assume the following- 100 of these matches took 3minutes (300minutes), 200 of these matches took 2 minutes (400 minutes), 161 of these matches took 1 minutes (161 minutes) So 461 wins would take roughly 861 minutes. Or 14.35hours. Let #8217;s say this user is pretty good assumably and only loses 1/8 matches. For 461 wins User would accumulate 57 loss matches This would total to 518 total matches. Let #8217;s say User isn #8217;t a big time waster and leaves quick if the match doesn #8217;t look good and if they stay they never run into overtime. So of the 57 matches let #8217;s say 25- disconnected after 30seconds, 20- 2 minutes, 12- 3 minutes (no overtime) This would equate to 12- 36 minutes, 20- 40 minutes, 25- 12minutes (roughly) 88 minutes. Add that to the 14.35 hours of all won matches and you get around 15.8 hours. Now there are loading screen times as well, if you #8217;re playing that many matches then the loading times are gonna add up. Let #8217;s say it takes- 30 seconds to get through the win screen/locker screen/back to menu And 30 seconds to find match, load in, and begin playing That would be 60seconds between every win and immediately starting a new match. roughly 40 seconds if it #8217;s a loss because there is no locker screen That would be 60seconds- 461 total matches 40seconds- 57 total matches 461 minutes in loading times for wins 38 minutes in loading times for losses. 499 minutes. 8.3 hours. 15.8 hours + 8.3 hours = 24.1 hours. So 1 full day playing SPPD for 5 epics. Worth it.

*Angry Updoot*

Also.. #8221;50% OFF!!! #8221;...I haven #8217;t seen this pack before...so you #8217;re just personally valuing it at $20 so I feel like I #8217;m getting a steal for buying it...I understand we all got a free pack and that #8217;s all nice and dandy...but way to just make it easier for people who already spend hundreds of dollars to just get a quick discount. If anyone who is F2P has bought this offer put me in my place and lemme know.

Exactly it #8217;s not a terrible deal. Meaning that if you don #8217;t get it you #8217;re losing out, so guess my only point is them making it feeling like your more obligated to get it. I #8217;ve always just felt they value Legendaries/Epics at a higher real currency than what they should be worth. One legendary (2000cash typically in store) is valuing a single copy of a card at $20. To get one to lv 3 you are valuing that at $120. Idk I saw this as a strategic money grab on their part over the idea of trying to give us a nice offer.

WRITING.TITLE: Call Girl Packs
WRITING.TEXT: Assuming most of you have completed the call girl missions, you #8217;ll find there is no reason for the app any longer (besides assuming that they may release future superhero cards using it). Anyone else have the problem of completing the daily/weekly challenge, earning your pvp pack and then still wanting to play? Besides hoping on lucky lockers there isn #8217;t much you can gain from playing at that point until the 4hr wait is up. So what if they added daily call girl tasks. 6-8 random challenges (preferably pvp ones) that once completed gave you a card pack. The rewards wouldn #8217;t be outlandish, let #8217;s say 500 coins, 350 pvp tickets, and 5 cash, mixed with a couple cards and materials. It would make playing pvp a bit more interesting because more people would be using different cards to complete whatever their challenges were, and it #8217;d give players that would like to spend more time on the game something interesting to do if they wish to.
I know but...that #8217;s $250. And you only just completed the story, or did you just delay getting it done? What level NK are you?
Mr. Mind Control says #8220;HI #8221;
Hey good for you buddy I can #8217;t judge what you spend your money on. Just don #8217;t let this game eat your wallet up.

WRITING.TEXT: So the enemy played cyborg Kenny , I mind controlled and he attacked the NK and took 1 bar, as the bar was taken, mind control ended and cyborg ran into my randy, the kenny died from the phone blast at the same time as randy hit him, randy stood still and spawned 2 units, one belonging to me, one to my opponent. Randy then went back to attacking the enemy.
